name: BREAD: The Collection
description:
IN ORDER TO PLAY THESE GAMES, YOU NEED TO INSTALL SOME RUNTIMES FOR THE GAMES TO ACTUALLY RUN. INSTALL IT HERE

BREAD: The Collection is a short game series developed after some idiot got his hands on RPG Maker XP. No updates will be given, and instead given to Bread: Time Travel Trouble. This is a prototype, do not expect it to make sense, be fair, or fun. Some jokes you won't understand as they only make sense between my friends. Contains the game, and some empty folders.
